'''MINECON 2010''' was a gathering of ''Minecraft'' fans on a [[Java Edition Classic]] server from May 30 to June 1, 2010, to celebrate the first anniversary of the game's initial Classic release.<ref name="forum_thread">{{citation|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/11896-|title=MineCon 2010 OVER! Link to server level inside!|author=vede|website=Minecraft Forum|date=May 28, 2010}}</ref>

== Event ==
The event was organized through a [[Minecraft Forum]] thread,<ref name="forum_thread" /> which served as the unofficial hub for the server. Activities included:
* A [[spleef]] tournament.
* A building competition.
* An obstacle course race (a planned [[griefing]] competition was canceled).
* A signature wall where 167 participants, including [[Notch]], left their marks.

The server world was made available for download after the event<ref name="forum_thread" /><ref>{{citation|url=http://web.archive.org/web/20140219101331/http://res.public-craft.com/p/server_level.dat|title=MINECON 2010 Server Level|website=Public Craft|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140219101331/http://res.public-craft.com/p/server_level.dat|archive-date=February 19, 2014}}</ref> and is compatible with [[Classic server 1.10.1]] and [[Classic 0.30c]].
